Happy to announce an update that will help maintain this test extension free and available to everybody...but it requires action from you!

As the developer of this test extension, I get a small share of the revenue.

By opting in now, other than helping maintain this test extension free and available, you will be eligible to be in the beta version and start earning for your unused internet too. In case you change your mind, you can opt out at any time

Security and privacy are 100% guaranteed and the Monetization library is open source for everyone to see.

It doesn't collect, share, or sell personal information (not even anonymized data). Itâ€™s also highly regulated: THe Monetization library keeps communicating with Chrome Web Store regulators to guarantee a safe experience. It also provides CWS regulators with tools to monitor and enforce compliance.
